meanings.definition: A person with whom one works in the same organization.
meanings.sent1: My coworkers and I collaborate on projects together.
meanings.sent2: I have lunch with my coworkers every day.
meanings.sent3: My coworkers always make the office a lively place.
meanings.sent4: The synergy among my coworkers is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: I appreciate the support of my coworkers during busy times.

meanings.sent1: There are many coworkers in our department.
meanings.sent2: The coworkers gathered for a team meeting.
meanings.sent3: The party was full of coworkers enjoying themselves.
meanings.sent4: The room echoed with the chatter of coworkers.
meanings.sent5: The coworkers shared a sense of camaraderie.
